name: A Fishy Sequence
description:
"C" to Crouch
"Shift" to Run
"E" to Interact
Hold "E" to Hold Objects

You wake in a room. It is a bedroom with 3 doors and 1 window. The decoration is not bad. There is an aquarium with a fish in it and other objects that are very ordinary. You look outside of the window and see a garden. Then you want to leave the room. But you can’t. All the doors are locked. What are you going to do? Use your brain. Or ask the fish.

Game Engine: Unity Blender and Audacity

Genre: Escape Room Survival / FPS Survival / Suffering

Imported Assets:
